CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Luna Innovations Inc is active in advanced optical technology business. It provides high-performance fiber optic test, measurement and control products for the telecommunications and photonics industries; and distributed fiber optic sensing solutions that measure and monitor materials and structures for applications in aerospace, automotive, energy, oil and gas, security and infrastructure. The company's Lightwave segment develops, manufactures and markets distributed fiber optic sensing products and fiber optic communications test and control products.
